original_text: He does not blow them away, like the wind blows dry grass. They do not disappear like chaff that a storm blows away. He does not blow them away, like the wind blows dry grass. They do not disappear like chaff that a storm blows away. He does not blow them away,
korean_text: 그들이 바람 앞에 검불 같이, 폭풍에 날려가는 겨 같이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: He does not blow them away
like the wind blows dry grass
like chaff that a storm blows away
sentences.korean_translation: 폭풍이 날려 보내는 검과 같지 않다

like the wind blows dry grass
like chaff that a storm blows away
sentences.korean_translation: 폭풍이 날려 보내는 검과 같지 않다

sentences.original_text: He does not blow them away
